output.sentences: While visiting a friend I stopped in for a tour of an old church.
Much of my time was spent trying to figure out why there was a scarf on the statue.
The plaque sure didn't mention anything about a red scarf.
I was also stumped trying to figure out what type of flowers were at the entrance.
I decided I was too distracted by dumb things that had nothing to do with the old church so I went back to my friends house to watch a movie instead.
